item.title: Report X-2024110258
item.description:
Report X-2024110258

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-09
  • City: WEST POINT
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: State hazmat inspector noticed strong odor emitting from pressure relief vent assembly during a compliance inspection of TCIX 210101. A response contractor inspected the pressure relief vent assembly and found the gasket between the frangible disc and the seat of the pressure relief assembly to be deteriorated and deformed. A new gasket was installed the PRV was reassembled.
